function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential data breaches due to inadequate encryption and access control systems","Impact":"Exposure of sensitive data, compromising patient privacy and increasing the risk of unauthorized access","Mitigation":"Implement strong encryption and access control systems, regularly update security protocols, and conduct regular security audits","Technologies":"Blockchain, encryption algorithms, access control systems","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, data administrators","Owner":"IT security team, data compliance officer, healthcare management"},{"Description":"Non-compliance with data regulation laws such as HIPAA and GDPR","Impact":"Legal penalties, loss of trust, and compromised patient data privacy","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to data regulation laws, regular audits for compliance, and staff training on data protection laws","Technologies":"Data regulation compliance tools, encryption, access control systems","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, data administrators","Owner":"Data compliance officer, legal team, healthcare management"},{"Description":"Lack of strategy to handle downtime in cloud computing","Impact":"Disruption of healthcare services, loss of patient data access, and compromised patient care","Mitigation":"Implement a robust downtime management strategy, regular backup systems, and disaster recovery plan","Technologies":"Cloud backup systems, disaster recovery tools, redundant infrastructure","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, data administrators","Owner":"IT department, healthcare management"}]}
